"ChooseÂ© by Buryware 2014-16.
" "
See how far you can CHOOSE!
" "
A simple game of chance. 
Click the green play button to begin." "

Pick the right buttons, and you will advance." "
Start at level 1, and you will get : 1x2, 2x2, 3x3 matrixs of choices." "

Hit the RESET button restart a game
\ from your current level." "
To completely start over, use Start Over from the menu."
